author: sky.cactus
content: Ideally it would wait some amount of time for progress and then recreate.  6 months maybe is a bit too long, if someone says "don't mark as withdrawn" and then proceeds to do nothing, we should prompt to withdraw again.

author: sky.cactus
content: 1 week is a bit short, but if that is the "no work required" option I am fine with it.

author: sky.cactus
content: Assuming that we fix the bug where it opens a stagnant PR when there is already an open PR on the EIP.

author: alita85
content: Sure, it's very easy to change the frequency. Once a month for example
